name: Spacetronauts
description:
The exciting adventure throughout the galaxy is coming. Planet's last hope is in your hands, take control of the spaceship and protect Earth from alien. Your goal will be quite challenging as you will have to save the Universe from its evil enemies. In this space shooting game, you will be facing an increasingly large number of enemies.

Your increasing scores will help us to survive & defeat the enemies and to save our Universe.

 How to play : 

  • Use the ARROW buttons to navigate between the alien Spaceships.  

 Features : 

  • Can be played Offline. 
  • Endless Runner with Endless Fun.
